about_the_game:
A great gift of appreciation to Morteshka and a real treat for you! The Supporter Pack includes 3 awesome goodies (which you can find in the game folder) for you to enjoy:

Do note: track names below may contain soft spoilers, scroll down at your own risk.


  • Artbook

    Take a closer look at the Black Book's origins, the intricate details behind its design, concept arts, characters, lore, and much more.

  • New Skin For the Main Character

    Add some flair to your playthrough and have the main protagonist carry on her adventure in a traditional Russian outfit.

  • Full In-game Soundtrack

    Enjoy the entire collection of almost two hours of in-game music, including the folk songs collectible in-game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The Support Pack includes the game's full soundtrack, an additional skin for Vasilisa, and the artbook with the game's history, folklore, concept art, and much more.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
